statements: SELECT site_id, site_name, latitude, longitude, solar_potential FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE solar_potential = 'High';
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT site_name, solar_potential FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT site_name, solar_potential FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE longitude < -80.0;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE solar_potential = 'High';
SELECT site_id, site_name, solar_potential FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE latitude < 35.0 AND longitude > -90.0;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT site_name, energy_type FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE latitude > 10;
SELECT farm_name, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT location, capacity, status FROM solar_farms WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE energy_type = 'Solar';
SELECT id, farm_name, capacity FROM solar_farms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT site_name, energy_type FROM renewable_energy_sources UNION SELECT farm_name, status FROM solar_farms;
SELECT * FROM solar_farms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM solar_farms WHERE average_sunlight_hours > 5;
SELECT site_id, site_location FROM site_selection WHERE suitability_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT site_id, suitability_score FROM site_selection WHERE site_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM solar_farms ORDER BY location DESC, capacity DESC;
SELECT id, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE average_sunlight_hours > 6.0;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25.0 AND humidity < 70.0 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT site_id, ST_AsText(site_location) FROM site_selection WHERE suitability_score > 0.8;
SELECT SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM solar_farms;
SELECT * FROM SolarFarms;
SELECT id, capacity FROM SolarFarms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location, capacity, max_solar_intensity FROM SolarFarms WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT site_id, evaluation_date, suitability_score FROM SiteEvaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM SolarFarms;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT site_id, output_date, power_generated FROM PowerOutput ORDER BY output_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SiteEvaluation WHERE suitability_score > 0.7;
SELECT id, location, capacity, max_solar_intensity FROM SolarFarms WHERE capacity > 100 AND max_solar_intensity < 0.8;
SELECT * FROM sites;
SELECT name, location FROM sites WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT id, name FROM sites ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE production > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT site_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY site_id;
SELECT * FROM sites;
SELECT name, capacity FROM sites WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT location, size FROM solar_farms WHERE size < 50 AND capacity > 200;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT site_id, production, timestamp FROM energy_production WHERE production > 500 AND site_id = 3;
